chapters.title: Chapter 17:  An Arrival
chapters.info: Felaana Bevaine, p. 226—Slim, yellow-haired Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah. She was the only Aes Sedai in the common room of The Gates of Heaven to wear her shawl. She was the first to corner Moiraine when she arrived there. She did not know Moiraine, however, much less that she was a sister, and assumed she was a wilder.
